meaning_str.bing:
v. 破坏；消灭；摧残；打破(希望、计划)
网络. 毁坏；销毁；被毁

破坏；消灭；摧残；打破(希望、计划)

破坏；消灭；消除；打破计划；杀死；摧毁；抵消……结果；（destroy的过去式和过去分词）
从事破坏；造成破坏；（destroy的过去式和过去分词）

1.en: Essentially just a large hill, Qin Shi Huang's mausoleum is yet to be excavated due to fears it may be destroyed by the outside atmosphere.
1.cn: 说白了，就是一座大山，因为害怕外界的空气会破坏其中的文物，秦陵至今没有进行发掘。

2.en: Some of this art was sold abroad for hard currency, while much of the rest was destroyed or lost during the war.
2.cn: 这些艺术品中的一部分被卖到了国外，换成了硬通货，其余的大部分则在战争中摧毁或遗失。

3.en: But now I urge you to keep up your courage, because not one of you will be lost; only the ship will be destroyed.
3.cn: 现在我还劝你们放心。你们的性命，一个也不失丧，惟独失丧这船。

0.en: You're spaghettified as you fall in and you're destroyed.
0.cn: 在你掉入时你就被拉意面了，你就被摧毁了。

1.en: All of the beauty you and I have made in this place, the art of it, they would have destroyed it. They would have destroyed you.
1.cn: 我们在这里共同创造的美丽，还有其中的艺术，他们会将其摧毁，他们会将你摧毁。

2.en: You have to die. Every day. Until the Omega is destroyed.
2.cn: 你必须死天天死，直到Ω被摧毁。

3.en: I thought I ordered that nest to be destroyed not two moons past.
3.cn: 我两日前就下令要你摧毁那个巢穴了吧。

4.en: They destroyed our moon and with that, half the planet. Then they invaded.
4.cn: 他们摧毁了月球，还有半个地球。之后就大举入侵。

5.en: You destroyed the queen's ship. I must have. Yes. But you can't be certain? No.
5.cn: 你摧毁了虫后的飞船。应该是的。但你不确定？对。

6.en: How can you say that, huh? Do you think that you were the only one whose life was destroyed?
6.cn: 你怎么能这么说？你以为生活被彻底摧毁的只有你自己吗？

7.en: How did you escape with nothing but a scar while Lord Voldemort's powers were destroyed?
7.cn: 你是如何逃生，除了个伤疤毫发无损，而伏地魔的力量却被摧毁了？

8.en: They turned your organic life into our elemental metals. Our creators destroyed your world to make us.
8.cn: 它们可以将有机生命转化为金属元素，我们的造物主摧毁你们来创造我们。

9.en: We're lucky to be in the city. They say the war was terrible. That the rest of the world was destroyed.
9.cn: 我们很幸运能够生活在城市里，他们说战争是非常可怕的，世界上的其他地方都已被摧毁。

10.en: And what's the result? Lucas. Parish after parish was destroyed. People lost their homes. People lost everything.
10.cn: 结果是什么？卢卡斯。一个又一个行政区被摧毁了，人们失去了家园，失去了一切。

11.en: The people who destroyed the camp I was in with Martinez, they live in a prison. It's north off Highway 34.
11.cn: 摧毁了我和马丁内斯所在的营地的那些人，他们住在一座监狱里，在34号高速公路以北。

12.en: There are six stones out there. Thanos already has the Power Stone because he stole it last week when he decimated Xandar. He stole the Space Stone from me when he destroyed my ship and slaughtered half my people.
12.cn: 一共有六颗宝石。灭霸已经拿到了力量宝石那是他上周摧毁山达尔星时偷走的。他从我这儿偷走了空间宝石还摧毁了我的飞船杀了我一半人民。

13.en: I don't want to kill Ultron. He's unique. And he's in pain. But that pain will roll over the earth, so he must be destroyed.
13.cn: 我并不想杀死奥创，他是独特的，而且很痛苦，但他的痛苦会毁灭地球，所以他必须被摧毁。

14.en: Why did he leave? He was training a new generation of Jedi. One boy, an apprentice, turned against him, destroyed it all.
14.cn: 他为什么离开？他曾经培养了新一代绝地武士，有个男孩，他的徒弟，背叛了他，摧毁了一切。

15.en: It's been half a century since the scavengers destroyed our moon. Forced to leave their own dying planet, they came to take ours.
15.cn: 半个世纪前掠夺者摧毁了月球。他们被迫离开了自己即将枯萎的星球，来抢夺我们的家园。

16.en: These feelings generally lasts around 3-8 hours, as your brain cells naturally work to reuptake the serotonin and have it chemically destroyed.
16.cn: 这种感觉可以持续三到八个小时，脑内细胞会想摄取更多复合胺，然后用化学方法摧毁它。

17.cn: 我们毁灭并征服了世界。

18.en: It's already been lost. You destroyed it.
18.cn: 和平早就没有了，你一手毁掉的。

19.en: Everything we know and love has been destroyed.
19.cn: 我们所爱的一切都被毁掉了。
